"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557313b16368721ba9670600#post_557313b16368721ba9670600
[bq="Carcass Strife"]"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557313686368721ba9fc0500#post_557313686368721ba9fc0500
He was in my mother's belly, you know.
He got too sick to give birth to, so they had to abort him.[/bq]
I know your feel bro.
My mother told me that we were going to have brother twins.
But due some sickness, she needed to abort them.
Twins... that could be awesome having twin brothers.

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55734a4c6368722c66000f8f#post_55734a4c6368722c66000f8f
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55734a536368722c66000f9c#post_55734a536368722c66000f9c
What I mean is... Just imagine the situation if I had twin twin brothers.
We would need a bigger house
We would need a bigger car
We would need a more money for school, clothes, food, etc.
We specially would need more money for the university.
That would make my father to find a job.
